@zou3519: @soumith told me that we only care about compute capability 3.0+ (Kepler+) now. I think all the reductions here are within a warp. You can probably use the warp shuffle functions to implement them. Might be a bit faster.

Not necessary to change this, but worth keeping in mind in the future.

body:
@zou3519: @soumith told me that we only care about compute capability 3.0+ (Kepler+) now. I think all the reductions here are within a warp. You can probably use the [warp shuffle](http://docs.nvidia.com/cuda/cuda-c-programming-guide/index.html#warp-shuffle-functions) functions to implement them. Might be a bit faster.

Not necessary to change this, but worth keeping in mind in the future.
